Quiz: Navigating within a File in VSCode

Questions.question: Go to Beginning of Line
Questions.note: Move the cursor to the beginning of the line

Questions.question: Go to End of Line
Questions.note: Move the cursor to the end of the line

Questions.question: Go to Beginning of File
Questions.note: Move the cursor to the beginning of the file

Questions.question: Go to End of File
Questions.note: Move the cursor to the end of the file

Questions.question: Go to Next Word
Questions.note: Move the cursor to the beginning of the next word

Questions.question: Go to Previous Word
Questions.note: Move the cursor to the beginning of the previous word

Questions.question: Go to Line
Questions.note: Jump to a specific line in the current file

Questions.question: Scroll Line Up
Questions.note: Scroll the view up by one line

Questions.question: Scroll Line Down
Questions.note: Scroll the view down by one line
